posts.title: json-server
posts.body: json-server is a simple way to create a REST API with JSON data.

posts.title: react-query
posts.body: react-query is a powerful data-fetching library for React applications.

posts.title: next.js
posts.body: Next.js is a React framework that enables server-side rendering and static site generation.

posts.title: firebase
posts.body: Firebase is a platform developed by Google for creating mobile and web applications.

posts.title: node.js
posts.body: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

posts.title: java
posts.body: Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.

posts.title: python
posts.body: Python is an interpreted, high-level, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with the use of significant indentation.

posts.title: c++
posts.body: C++ is a general-purpose programming language created by Bjarne Stroustrup as an extension of the C programming language.

posts.title: ruby
posts.body: Ruby is a dynamic, open source programming language with a focus on simplicity and productivity.

posts.title: go
posts.body: Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software.

posts.title: typescript
posts.body: TypeScript is a strict syntactical superset of JavaScript that adds optional static typing.

posts.title: graphql
posts.body: GraphQL is a query language for APIs and a runtime for executing those queries with your existing data.

posts.title: docker
posts.body: Docker is a set of platform as a service products that use OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers.

posts.title: kubernetes
posts.body: Kubernetes is an open-source system for automating the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.

posts.title: aws
posts.body: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a comprehensive cloud computing platform provided by Amazon.
